org.dmfs.android.calendarcontent.provider

Class CalendarContentContract.Products

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dmfs.android.calendarcontent.provider.CalendarContentContract.Products
  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarContentContract

    public static class CalendarContentContract.Products
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the list of all known products. It contains the products of all content items that have been downloaded or purchased.

    • Field Summary

      static long MAX_FREE_TRIAL_PERIOD

    • Method Detail

      • updateProduct

        public static int updateProduct(Context context,
                java.lang.String productId,
                java.lang.String orderId,
                java.lang.String purchaseToken)
        Update a product by its product identifier. The product will be added if it didn't exist before.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        productId - The product identifier.
        orderId - The order id or null to remove it.
        purchaseToken - The purchase token or null to remove it.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 if the update failed.

      • updateProduct

        public static int updateProduct(Context context,
                java.lang.String productId,
                long freeTrialPeriod)
        Set a trial period for a product identified by its product identifier. The product will be added if it didn't exist before.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        productId - The product identifier.
        freeTrialPeriod - Duration of a free trial period. Must not exceed MAX_FREE_TRIAL_PERIOD. Can be 0 to stop the free trial immediately and remove all calendars if there is no valid order or activation response for this product.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 if the update failed.
